body_html:
@vincentvanhoucke I have been away for a while but I'm trying to implement batch norm now on LSTMs.

Thank you for updating nn.moments() -- I will try to work on this to implement sequence wise batch normalization. Really appreciate the help!

body:
@vincentvanhoucke I have been away for a while but I'm trying to implement batch norm now on LSTMs. 

Thank you for updating `nn.moments()` -- I will try to work on this to implement sequence wise batch normalization. Really appreciate the help!
